# SETUP
## Attach packages
```{r}
library(osrm)
library(ggplot2)
```


## Define constants 
```{r}
pier_coords <- c(51.533215, 0.716192)

pier_iso <- osrmIsochrone(loc = pier_coords,
                          breaks = seq(from = 10,to = 20, by = 10),
                          res = 300,
                          returnclass = "sf", 
                          osrm.profile = "walk")
```


```{r}
map_iso_pier <- ggplot() +
  geom_s
```
